The common functions are within this namespace.


namespace  boost::xint::blockable
 

Contains the blockable integer type, and functions to operate on it.


Functions

Operators

These act exactly the same as for the built-in integer types.

Detailed Description

Contains the definitions for the basic math operators for blockable integers.
